searchDocs.title: Trove​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> Avatar.Trove: Trove Handles cleaning up after models are changed or deleted

searchDocs.title: Tag​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> Avatar.Tag: String The tag that all avatar models get when created by this Avatar class

searchDocs.title: UserID​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> Avatar.UserID: number The userID of which the avatar model is created after

searchDocs.title: Owner​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> Avatar.Owner: number The UserID of which this avatar model is made for

searchDocs.title: Model​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> Avatar.Model: Model?  The current Avatar model which is being used by this class. CAUTION This can be nil at times like when the avatar is being made, or when the userID is switched and a new model is being made!

searchDocs.title: PositionLoop​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> Avatar.PositionLoop: RBXScriptConnection  The current bind for RunService.PreRender used for positioning the Avatar model

searchDocs.title: new​
searchDocs.content: </> Avatar.new( UserID: number,-- The userID that the avatar model should use OwnerUserID: number-- The userID of the person the avatar model is for ) → Avatar Create a new avatar class instance

searchDocs.title: SetTransparency​
searchDocs.content: </> Avatar:SetTransparency(New: number) → () Sets the current LOCAL transparency for the avatar model. Meaning that this method only changes the transparency for the owner of the Avatar model.

searchDocs.title: PositionModelLoop​
searchDocs.content: </> Avatar:PositionModelLoop() → () Sets up a new position loop for the current avatar model WARNING Intended for internal use only!

searchDocs.title: ConstructModel​
searchDocs.content: </> Avatar:ConstructModel() → () Deletes old Avatar model, disconnects all events and creates new Avatar model and connects new events WARNING Intended for internal use only!

searchDocs.title: Clean​
searchDocs.content: </> Avatar:Clean() → () Disconnect all events and delete any avatars with the objects tag WARNING Intended for internal use only!

searchDocs.title: Destroy​
searchDocs.content: </> Avatar:Destroy() → () Destroy the avatar model as well as all data about it
